welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the picturesque city of Arth, Switzerland! Known for its stunning natural beauty and rich history, we invite you to explore and discover all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Arth."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buochs Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buochs Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zurich Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zurich Airport, mainly used for regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for flights operated by Swiss International Air Lines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi by connecting to the network and completing a short registration process.
